title: mangala nama sankirtanam
sahitya:
Mangkala Naama Sangkeerthanam Seikuvom

 Maanidare Vaareer












anupallavi 






 Shankara Saamba Sadaa Siva Naarana

 Sambuja Narthana Jaya Hari Hari Entre







caraNam






 Om Ganapathy Guha Om SaravanaPava

 Om Shakthi Vaani Kalyaani MahaaLakshmi

 Om Sudha Satuguru Om Sachithaananda

 Om Paripoorana Parama Pithaa Entre
